responses:
To fix a slow computer, try the following:
 1) Try cleaning hard drive space with a disk cleanup tool
 + 2) Close background processes via task manager
 3) Consider upgrading RAM

To fix a computer that is freezing, try the following:
 1) Update device drivers
 2) Make sure the computer is not overheating
 3) Run a malware scan on the device

patterns: blue screen of death on computer
responses:
To potentially resolve a blue screen, try the following:
 1) Update device drivers
 2) Run hardware diagnostics to identify potentially failing components

To fix a software error, try the following:
 1) Update software
 2) Reinstall or repair (if applicable) software
 3) Restart your computer

To fix a slow connection, try the following:
 1) Restart your modem/router
 2) Connect an ethernet cable to your device
